channel.title: Barrage help
channel.description:
i need some help with a code. NOTE: I AM USING A DELTASCAPE BASED SOURCE.
Im not exactly sure how this would work but..
i was wondering if there was a way to make it so if you are frozen (barraged, etc.) that it will remove the choice to follow or attack
i was think something like:
[code]if frozen == true; then [/code] ...a coding that removes the attack and follow option.
and i am stuck there, i am not that good of a coder so im going to need some help finishing it. I WILL GIVE YOU CREDIT FOR HELPING ME.
